alert.note: Alert for Shannon (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 23 at 11:38PM CDT until March 24 at 12:15AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Shannon County in south central Missouri... * Until 1215 AM CDT. * At 1137 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles east of Raymondville to near Mountain View, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Echo Bluff State Park, Current River State Park, Ozark National Scenic Riverways, Eminence, Summersville, Alley Spring, Midridge, Round Spring, West Eminence, Akers and Pine Crest. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
